org.qcri.rheem.core.profiling

Class CardinalityRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.profiling.CardinalityRepository

  • public class CardinalityRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores cardinalities that have been collected by the CrossPlatformExecutor. Current version uses JSON as serialization format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardinalityRepository(Configuration configuration) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sleep()
      Allows this instance to free its system resources, as they might not be needed in the closer future.
      void store(OutputSlot<?> output, long cardinality, OptimizationContext.OperatorContext operatorContext)
      Stores the cardinality for the output together with its Operator and input CardinalityEstimates.
      void storeAll(ExecutionState executionState, OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
      Store the input and output cardinalities for all those Operators that have a measured output cardinality.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardinalityRepository

        public CardinalityRepository(Configuration configuration)

    • Method Detail

      • storeAll

        public void storeAll(ExecutionState executionState,
                     OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Store the input and output cardinalities for all those Operators that have a measured output cardinality.
        Parameters:
        executionState - contains the cardinalites of the instrumented Slots; those cardinalities should be already injected in the rheemPlan
        optimizationContext - keeps CardinalityEstimates for all Slots around; it is assumed, that any measured cardinalities are already injected in this OptimizationContext to guarantee that we capture the most possible accurate data

      • store

        public void store(OutputSlot<?> output,
                  long cardinality,
                  OptimizationContext.OperatorContext operatorContext)
        Stores the cardinality for the output together with its Operator and input CardinalityEstimates.

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Allows this instance to free its system resources, as they might not be needed in the closer future.
